Package ohos.agp.text

Class FontFamily

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.FontFamily

  • public class FontFamily
extends Object
    Provides a set of fonts (RawFont) of different styles to create Font.

    Ensure that the raw fonts added to a FontFamily belong to the same family, and they are only different in style (such as weight and italic).

    Since:
    7

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  FontFamily.Builder
      Provides a builder to create a FontFamily instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getRawFont

        public RawFont getRawFont​(int index)
        Obtains the RawFont object identified by the specified index in this FontFamily.
        Parameters:
        index - Indicates the index specified.
        Returns:
        Returns the RawFont object if the operation is successful; returns null if the specified index is invalid.

      • getSize

        public int getSize​()
        Obtains the number of RawFont objects in this FontFamily.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of RawFont objects.

      • getRawFont

        public RawFont getRawFont​(int weight,
                          boolean isItalic)
        Obtains the RawFont of the specified style in this FontFamily.

        This method attempts to find a closest match, may not be the exact match.

        Parameters:
        weight - Indicates the font weight.
        isItalic - Specifies whether the font is in italics. The value true means that the font is in italics, and false means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns the RawFont object that most matches the specified conditions.

      • createFamilyWithVariations

        public FontFamily createFamilyWithVariations​(String variations)
        Creates a FontFamily based on this FontFamily and the font variation settings.
        Parameters:
        variations - Indicates the font variation settings.
        Returns:
        Returns the new FontFamily object created; returns null if this FontFamily does not support the font variation settings.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if the specified variations is null.

      • hasGlyph

        public boolean hasGlyph​(int codePoint,
                        int variationSelector)
        Checks whether the FontFamily contains a glyph corresponding to the character specified by the Unicode.
        Parameters:
        codePoint - Indicates the Unicode value.
        variationSelector - Indicates the variation selector of the font. For details, see: Variation Selectors
        Returns:
        Returns true if the FontFamily contains a glyph corresponding to the character specified by the Unicode; returns false otherwise.
